items.preText: Sabbir Rahman.. Needs to get going right away
items.text: floats up a full toss that's driven down to long-off
plants the front foot across and flicks behind square
full outside off, pushes into the covers and sets off for a quick single. Whips off the helmet and soaks in the cheers from the dressing room. Slowest century by a Bangladesh batsman in ODIs

items.preText: Fernando Fermin: "Remember they're playing in Guyana, this pitch is a graveyard, BAN already has more than enough runs on board"
items.text: full outside off, pushed out to sweeper cover
backs away to a fuller one and squeezes it out to backward point
direct hit, and Tamim was gone. Takes off for a single with Sabbir having tapped to cover. Russell was fairly close to the stumps and dives forward but throws it over the stumps
extremely full outside off, squirts it out through backward point
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: As Tamim Iqbal celebrates his century, here's what he is like off the field. WATCH this fun episode of 25 questions with Tamim.
items.text: backs away to a fuller one drills it down to long-on

items.shortText: Bishoo to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: advances down the ground and tries to heave it with the turn but skews it off the inside of the bat to midwicket
he's been stumped. No need to even go upstairs. Sabbir is drawn forward by a length ball that rips past the outside edge. Loses balance as he's left reaching out and the backfoot slides out

dismissal.text: Sabbir Rahman st †Hope b Bishoo 3 (4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00

items.preText:
Mushfiqur

Luqi : ""AB would have scored 4 centuries in that many balls''"
items.text: goes for the reverse sweep straight away - not much else he can do at this stage - gets it over the backward point region
sees him backing away and bowls this further outside off but too wide

items.preText: Looks like Sabbir was hard done by. The foot didn't come off the air when the bails were off. The on-field umpire didn't send it upstairs but nor did the batsman
items.text: driven to long-off
swipes across the line of a length ball and gets an inside edge to square leg

items.preText: Tasmeem: "Can a stumping decision be overturned on DRS?" Yes, because it was the on-field umpire's decision.
items.text: slashes at the sight of width and finds short third man
full, pushed across, sneaks underneath the bat to the keeper
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: again, tries to squeeze it out but he's well away from it and only hits the ground
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: no movement towards the line and again throws his hands at it to get an outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length, heaves a pull through deep midwicket
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: big slog. Fetches it from outside off and sends it soaring over midwicket with meaty connection
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, SIX runs

items.text: throws his hands at a wide one and gets it just past a leaping Gayle at gully, third man cuts it off at the boundary
backs away and Holder fires it away from the batsman. Seemed to be outside the line but not given a wide
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: again flirts with the line but this time Rahim moves towards the delivery and crunches it through extra cover
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs
